configSys.overTimeTip: Time range: 15-60 minutes. If the operation is not done after the set time, the system will automatically log out
configSys.setEnd: minutes of timeout, start timeout and go offline
configSys.LoginLockTip: Frequency range: 3-5 times, lock time range: 10-60 minutes, if more than the number of times after the lock time, you can not log in
configSys.LoginLockM: times in a row, locked for
configSys.passLengthTip: Password length range: 8-128 bits. If the password is not changed, it cannot be passed
configSys.passLengthF: Password length must not be less than
configSys.passPerTip: Password validity range: 30 to 365 days, the password is only valid within the specified time period, if it exceeds the validity period, you need to modify the password, otherwise you will not be able to log in
configSys.testTip: Test mailbox is used to test whether the mailbox can be sent normally. You must save the configuration before the test operation
configSys.correctSMTP: Please input the correct SMTP Server address
configSys.inputSMTP: Please input the SMTP Server address
configSys.correctMail: Please input the correct email address
configSys.testSuc: Send successfully! Please go to {email} to check the test email
configSys.configSMTP: Please configure the SMTP server before testing
configSys.failCreateSMTP: Failed to create SMTP server, please try again!
configSys.configTitleTips: Please contact the server administrator to get configuration Information.Only Microsoft active directory, Apache directory server, Fedora directory and openldap directory servers are supported.
configSys.ldapTestFiled: Test failed, please check LDAP configuration!
configSys.userException: Test failed, please check user name or password!
configSys.hostnameDes: Host name of the server running LDAP.For example, ldap.example.com
configSys.usernameDes: The user logs in to LDAP. For example,user@domain.name or cn= user, dc = domain, dc = name
configSys.baseDnDes: Search for users and groups from the LDAP root node.For example, cn = user, dc = example, dc = com
configSys.usernameAttrDes: Used on the user object.For example: cn, sAMAccountName
configSys.userMailDes: Used to load user email addresses
configSys.userPassDes: User password attribute for managing user passwords
configSys.userEncDes: Please select an encryption algorithm for your directory password
configSys.codeRule: Only supported in Chinese, English, numbers and special characters on the keyboard
configSys.namePlace: Please enter the storage location name
configSys.accountPlace: Please enter the access account name
configSys.passPlace: Please enter the access account password
configSys.ipPlace: Please enter http address in the form of IP: port
configSys.nebulaIpPlace: Please enter IP address and port of graphd service: port
configSys.ipRepeat: Storage address already exists, please re-enter
configSys.deletedStorage: Are you sure to delete the graph database "{name}" ?
configSys.deletedIndex: Are you sure to delete the OpenSearch "{name}" ?
configSys.deldes: Delete will not be retrieved. Please be careful.
configSys.delGraphPlace: Please enter the name of the graph database location
configSys.delUseing: The index configuration has been bound and cannot be deleted
configSys.duplicateOsConfigError: Including system user name, password, IP and port index configuration
